text.author: Edgar Allan Poe
text.title: Annabel Lee
text.summary: This poem tells of the strong childhood love of the narrator and the beautiful Annabel Lee many years ago in a kingdom by the sea, which led the envious angels of heaven to chill and kill her via a wind out of a cloud at night, though their souls cannot be dissevered and the narrator continues to dream of her and feel her bright eyes.

head.s: ANNABEL NP Annabel LEE NP Lee . SENT .
